description: A celebrated dancer from Sumeru, Nilou is a Hydro sword user who excels at enabling Bloom reactions and supporting Dendro teams.

artifacts.name: Vourukasha's Glow (2) + Tenacity of the Millelith (2)

talents: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
info: Nilou is a Hydro DPS/support who specializes in enabling powerful Bloom reactions in Dendro teams. Build her for HP% and Elemental Mastery.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dance of Samser
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 consecutive sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 consecutive sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to perform a spinning attack, dealing AoE DMG to nearby enemies.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
skills.desc: Nilou enters the Pirouette state, dealing Hydro DMG and enabling her to perform Sword Dance or Whirling Steps, which deal AoE Hydro DMG and apply the Lingering Aeon effect.
skills.details_html:
Dance of Haftkarsvar
Enters Pirouette state, dealing Hydro DMG and enabling Sword Dance or Whirling Steps, which deal AoE Hydro DMG and apply Lingering Aeon.

skills.name: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
skills.desc: Nilou creates a Lotus of Distant Waters, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting the Golden Chalice's Bounty effect, which enhances Bloom reactions.
skills.details_html:
Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
Creates a Lotus of Distant Waters, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting Golden Chalice's Bounty, enhancing Bloom reactions.

passive_talents.name: Court of Dancing Petals
passive_talents.desc: If the entire party is all Dendro and Hydro, Nilou's skills grant the Golden Chalice's Bounty, enhancing Bloom reactions.

passive_talents.name: Dreamy Dance of Aeons
passive_talents.desc: Each 1,000 points of Max HP above 30,000 increases the DMG of Bountiful Cores by 9%. Max 400% increase.

passive_talents.name: White Jade Lotus
passive_talents.desc: When Nilou cooks a Perfect dish, she has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
constellations.desc: Dance of Haftkarsvar's third step deals 65% increased DMG and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
constellations.desc: Golden Chalice's Bounty duration is increased by 6s.

constellations.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Dance of Haftkarsvar by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fricative Pulse
constellations.desc: After a character triggers a Bloom reaction, all party members gain 15% Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.name: Twirling Light
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
constellations.desc: After triggering a Bloom reaction, Nilou's ATK is increased by 30% for 20s.
